body_html:
Could you try disabling GCP support whenever we are on a big endian system?
I think that should do the trick. You can then disable the tests under tensorflow/core/platform/cloud with a tag like no_big_endian, then we need to edit the s390x testing bazel command with --test_tag_filters=-no_big_endian
body_text:
Could you try disabling GCP support whenever we are on a big endian system?
I think that should do the trick. You can then disable the tests under tensorflow/core/platform/cloud with a tag like no_big_endian, then we need to edit the s390x testing bazel command with --test_tag_filters=-no_big_endian
body:
Could you try disabling GCP support whenever we are on a big endian system?
I think that should do the trick. You can then disable the tests under `tensorflow/core/platform/cloud` with a tag like `no_big_endian`, then we need to edit the s390x testing bazel command with `--test_tag_filters=-no_big_endian`
